org.missile.model.missile
Class MissilesTracker

java.lang.Object
  org.missile.model.template.GameElementTracker
      org.missile.model.missile.MissilesTracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<GameElement>
public class MissilesTracker
extends GameElementTracker

Missile collection handler

This class is a type of GameElementTracker which controls a Missile collection. It knows when to move a missile and how to calculate the hits with another game elements.

Author:
luizcarlos
See Also:
Missile, GameElementTracker

Constructor Detail

MissilesTracker

public MissilesTracker()
Method Detail

check

public void check()
Iterates over the missile list and check if they still can move. In case they don't, we will remove them.

hits

public boolean hits(MissileHitable element)
Returns whether the missiles impact with a given game element.

Parameters:
element - MissileHitable element to be checked.
Returns:
true if any missile of the collection has impacted with the element.

hits

public java.util.List<MissileHitable> hits(java.util.Iterator iterator)
Calculates whether the missiles have impacted with any element of a list

Parameters:
iterator - over the list of elements to be checked for impact.
Returns:
the list of MissileHitable which have impacted with a missile
